subject: Re: HBT Deals and Order Form

full_threads.body: (Time: 20mins) Dev+QA time

Hi Bonnie,

We are happy to inform you that we have successfully added the discounts to the Deals and Orders Page.

Also, here's a Loom video on how to edit the sections moving forward.
👉View the video here
👉Here is the link to edit the form

Feel free to let us know if you have any further queries.
(Time: 390mins) dev + QA time on previous update

Hi Bonnie,

Hope you had a wonderful weekend.

We've passed these discount additions along to our team and will keep you posted as soon as we have an update.

We'll also send you steps on how to update this via WordPress Dashboard.

Hi Joy, Sorry - I didn't mention this as I thought I could add the info myself, however, upon looking, I am unsure how to… Under each deal on the order form can you please add the discount? I have listed the discount % for each brand below. Please note they are all 15% off except for Dewalt Wet & Dry Vacuums which are 10% off. MASTER LOCK: 15% off invoice POLYTUF: 15% off invoice SPIDER TARP 15% off invoice ALL LION: 15% off invoice DEWALT VOZZO JACKETS & WORKWEAR: 15% off invoice DEALT WET/DRY: 10% off invoice GREAT AUSSIE WIPES: 15% off invoice GECKO: 15% off invoice THERMACELL" 15% off invoice CHARLIE CARP: 15% off invoice POTS: 15% off invoice On the DEALS page, please add the discounts as per below: LION:
  • Add 15% OFF INVOICE PRICE under both deal headings
Dewalt:
  • Add 15% OFF INVOICE PRICE under the workwear heading
  • Add 10% OFF INVOICE PRICE under the wet/dry vacuums heading
Gecko:
  • Add 15% OFF INVOICE PRICE under the heading
Thermacell:
  • Add 15% OFF INVOICE PRICE under the heading
Charlie Carp:
  • Add 15% OFF INVOICE PRICE under the heading

mm/dd/yyyy is not used in Australia.

Here an update on our progress with the Deals and Order page. It's currently viewable only when logged in via WP Dashboard.

View the Order Page here
View the Deals Page here 

We’re still refining the pages to align closely with the brief you shared, and we’ll let you know once everything’s wrapped up tomorrow.

In the meantime, feel free to share any feedback and we'll look into it tomorrow as well.

Hi Bonnie,

We appreciate the quick response.

Rest assured, this is noted and will send you another update tomorrow.

Hi Joy,

The customer just needs to enter the qty that they want to purchase. The information on the form and qtys requested should then be sent to nbarwick@mayohardware.com.au and he will process all the orders in our system directly.

This should essentially just work as a submission form.

Looking forward to hearing back from you very soon.
